org.openimaj.content.slideshow

Class SlideshowApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.content.slideshow.Slideshow
      • org.openimaj.content.slideshow.SlideshowApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener, EventListener

    public class SlideshowApplication
extends Slideshow
    A slideshow that can be used in a Java Swing application. The slideshow is created in a new window (JFrame).
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
